verses.name: Exodus 27:4
verses.text: And thou shalt make for it a grate of network of brass; and upon the net shalt thou make four brasen rings in the four corners thereof.

verses.name: Exodus 27:5
verses.text: And thou shalt put it under the compass of the altar beneath, that the net may be even to the midst of the altar.

verses.name: Exodus 27:6
verses.text: And thou shalt make staves for the altar, staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with brass.

verses.name: Exodus 27:7
verses.text: And the staves shall be put into the rings, and the staves shall be upon the two sides of the altar, to bear it.
